Sentry, an Aurelia Template 29 Sep 2015

Though everyone can make something work, there is definitely a right way to handle authentication in an Aurelia app. Sentry is a working compilation of answers to some of the most frequently asked questions around Aurelia and Authentication.

Source is available in GitHub.
